snippet.title: Heroes Arena Trailer
snippet.description:
HEROES ARENA is the newest and best global multiplayer online battle arena game designed specifically for mobile, focused on fair esports. Enjoy massive PVP action with 1v1, 3v3, 5v5 and other multiplayer battle modes for you to join in as players battle to climb rankings to earn glory and awesome prizes! Choose your favorite hero, team up and communicate with your friends for epic partnerships, battle across beautifully rendered maps through hordes of minions, monsters and guardian turrets to destroy the enemy’s generator and obtain victory! Download and join HEROES ARENA, Fair eSports!

Download For Free :
Playstore - https://goo.gl/SFfysH
Appstore - Coming Soon

Official Website : http://ha.ucool.com/
Official facebook : http://facebook.com/heroesarenaofficial/
Official Youtube : https://goo.gl/iJf3jF

Watch Vainglory gameplay : https://goo.gl/WYR5We
Watch Mobile Legends Gameplay : https://goo.gl/yydgMn
Watch King of Glory Gameplay : https://goo.gl/3s5X0v
Watch Realm of Valor gameplay : https://goo.gl/3r786B
Watch Garena 傳說對決 : https://goo.gl/Gy2Grq
Watch 時空召喚 Gameplay : https://goo.gl/m5sPty
Watch Endless Hegemony Gameplay : https://goo.gl/KhtO2m
Watch Planet Of Heroes Gameplay : https://goo.gl/koyDDg
Watch Legendary 5v5 MOBA Gameplay : https://goo.gl/qJge3P
Watch Heroes Arena Gameplay : https://goo.gl/GpWMN5
